original_text: And Asa went out to meet him, and they drew up their lines of battle in the Valley of Zephathah at Mareshah.
korean_text: 아사가 마주 나가서 마레사의 스바다 골짜기에 전열을 갖추고

sentences.original_text: And Asa went out to meet him
and they drew up their lines of battle
in the Valley of Zephathah at Mareshah
